select * from vinvin.shop7WarehouseInputlog where id=#{id} order by time;
mapper.update: update vinvin.main1WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.main2WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop1WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop2WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop3WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop4WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop5WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop6WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
update vinvin.shop7WarehouseInputlog set itemName=#{itemName} where logid=#{logid};
mapper.insert: insert ignore into vinvin.dumpItem(logid, id, brand, itemCount, expiredDate, howLong, reason, dumptime, action, location, category, memo, if_pass, status) VALUE (#{logid},#{id}, #{brand}, #{itemCount}, #{expiredDate}, #{howLong}, #{reason}, #{dumptime}, #{action}, #{location}, #{category}, #{memo}, #{if_pass}, #{status});
mapper.select: select dump.*,item.itemName from vinvin.dumpItem dump right join vinvin.all_item item on dump.id=item.id where dump.location=#{location} and dump.category=#{category} and dump.if_pass=#{if_pass};
select count(*) from vinvin.dumpItem where logid=#{logid} limit 1;
mapper.update: update vinvin.dumpItem set if_pass=true,status=#{status} where logid=#{logid};
mapper.select: select itemCount from vinvin.dumpItem where logid=#{logid};
select dump.*,item.itemName from vinvin.dumpItem dump right join vinvin.all_item item on dump.id=item.id where dump.logid=#{logid};
mapper.insert: insert into vinvin.receiveError(logid, id, brand, itemCount, ifComplete, location, category) VALUE (#{logid}, #{id}, #{brand}, #{itemCount}, #{ifComplete}, #{location}, #{category});
mapper.select: select error.*,item.itemName from vinvin.receiveError error right join vinvin.all_item item on item.id=error.id where location=#{location} and category=#{category};
select error.*,item.itemName from vinvin.receiveError error right join vinvin.all_item item on item.id=error.id where ifComplete=#{ifComplete} and location=#{location} and category=#{category};
mapper.update: update vinvin.receiveError set ifComplete=#{ifComplete} where logid=#{logid};
mapper.insert: insert ignore into vinvin.fruitInvoice(invoiceid, time, memo, location) VALUE (#{invoiceid}, #{time}, #{memo}, #{location});
insert ignore into vinvin.filetype(id, filepath) VALUE (#{id},#{filepath});
insert into vinvin.itemExpireDate(itemID, time, location, ifDump) VALUE (#{itemID}, #{time}, #{location}, false);
mapper.select: select expire.*,item.itemName from vinvin.itemExpireDate expire right join vinvin.all_item item on expire.itemID=item.id where location=#{location} and time!='123' and ifDump=false order by time ASC;

select expire.*,item.itemName from vinvin.itemExpireDate expire right join vinvin.all_item item on expire.itemID=item.id where expire.location=#{location} and expire.time=#{time} order by expire.time DESC;

select expire.*,item.itemName from vinvin.itemExpireDate expire right join vinvin.all_item item on expire.itemID=item.id where expire.location=#{location} and expire.time<=#{time} and expire.ifDump=false order by expire.time DESC;

select expire.*,item.itemName from vinvin.itemExpireDate expire right join vinvin.all_item item on expire.itemID=item.id where expire.location=#{location} and expire.time<=#{time1} and expire.time>#{time2} and expire.ifDump=false order by expire.time DESC;
mapper.update: update vinvin.itemExpireDate set time=#{time},ifDump=#{ifDump} where id=#{id};
